featured.text: Type-A people are generally considered sensitive perfectionists and good team players, but over-anxious.
I….very anxious to carry out the project.

definition.zh_def: 焦慮的，擔心的，心神不寧的。
definition.en_def: Experiencing worry, unease, or nervousness about something with an uncertain outcome.
definition.example: She felt anxious about the upcoming exam.
